history.head: Pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering

achievements: Secured worldwide rank of 779 in Google Hash Code 2022
about.bio:
Hey there! I am a sophomore with a great desire to learn various development skills. I am enthusiastic in Web3 and Blockchain Technologies and currently learning the same. Besides coding, I can also do some graphic designing jobs - logos etc. My hobbies include playing video games and playing Guitar.
Feel free to contact me for anything :)
